column5: Snuck out for an hour this morning by myself for some relaxing fishing.Have tried casting further out than where I was catching before and seems to be the right spot.I caught 1 carp,1 bass and lost 3 others to overzealous hook sets.The carp felt like 50 pounds with all the weeds my line dragged in.Here are some pics.I am sure another report will follow as Tyler's new reel arrived in the mail today.A big thank you to the member who donated it to his cause.
Your becoming a very good carper there fatherof3. Good on ya,and thanks for the reports.
Nice report, glad to see the fish cooperate for you again.  Thats a beauty carp, and I see you also were able to land the elusive "dirt bass"
